chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Peral Torval, p. 68 (65)—One of Taim's close-following Asha'man. He is close to his middle years, and has a sharp nose. He grew up in Tarabon. He was among those who tried to kill Rand. See also Dashiva, Corlan; Gedwyn, Charl; Kisman, Raefar; Rochaid, Manel.
